revised_title: Electric Field Force on Cylindrical Conductors and Spheroids
tldr: The article investigates the force exerted by an electric field on a long cylindrical conductor and a spheroidal conductor. The authors calculate the equivalent axial distribution of charge along the conductor's centerline and determine the force acting on it. The study provides a method to calculate the force on any axisymmetric conductor in contact with a plane, given the equivalent distribution of charge along the axis.
